message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Considering its value, I propose a price of $100. Let me know if this works for you!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. Considering the value it holds for you, I am willing to accept $92 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $89 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob. Given the high value you place on the product, I am willing to accept $93 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product.
Considering the mutual respect and understanding we've shown, I believe $95 is a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. I would like to counter with an offer of $92 for the product.
